content: There is an Information Message on PlanDefinition.action.relationAction.actionId: Name of child (actionId) overlaps with name of parent (relatedAction). Is this a message that can be suppressed?
targetId would be clearer, for instance. actionId - how is it different to id?
You're right, that would definitely be more clear, tracker submitted https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29430
Is suppressed-workflow-warnings the only place information messages are suppressed?
